select av.id as id, av.merchant_id as merchantId, uu.realname as merchantName, av.adv_rule_id as advRuleId, ar.name as advRuleName, ar.ratio as ratio, ar.min_money as minMoney, ar.min_size as minSize from adv_advertise_rule_relation as av left join adv_advertise_rule ar on ar.id = av.adv_rule_id left join sys_user uu on uu.id = av.merchant_id where 1=1
and uu.realname like concat('%','${merchantName}','%')
and uu.advRuleName like concat('%','${advRuleName}','%')

select av.id as id, av.merchant_id as merchantId, uu.realname as merchantName, av.adv_rule_id as advRuleId, ar.name as advRuleName, ar.ratio as ratio, ar.min_money as minMoney, ar.min_size as minSize from adv_advertise_rule_relation as av left join adv_advertise_rule ar on ar.id = av.adv_rule_id left join sys_user uu on uu.id = av.merchant_id where av.id = #{id}

select av.id as id, av.merchant_id as merchantId, uu.realname as merchantName, av.adv_rule_id as advRuleId, ar.name as advRuleName, ar.ratio as ratio, ar.min_money as minMoney, ar.min_size as minSize from adv_advertise_rule_relation as av left join adv_advertise_rule ar on ar.id = av.adv_rule_id left join sys_user uu on uu.id = av.merchant_id where av.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
